dealWithInfo

public int dealWithInfo(java.lang.String[] info,
                        int[] adjPos)
A version that calculates the likeability of all the adjective fields based on a legend that says where they are. Accepts a 1D array of all the movie's information, parses, and otherwise deals with it. Position 0 is ID 1 is the normal name. 2 is a comma-separated list of genres/adjectives/tags/actors/etc 3 is the rating. 4 is the year. 5 is the array of actors/directors/other real things 6 is the array of keywords Unfinished.

Parameters:
info - the String array of info
the - positions of the adjectives
Returns:
the overall likeability

the index number

isWithinRange

public boolean isWithinRange(float n,
                             char type)
Checks to see if the rating is in the acceptable range

Parameters:
r - the rating to check
type - 'r' if you want to check rating, 'y' for year
Returns:
true if it is within range

setLike

public void setLike(int[][] li)
Receives a array of traits likeability (1, 0, -1). The index no. is the trait ID (e.g. genre), the values are the likeability of the trait.

Parameters:
like - the likeability of the trait
